game.title: The Quest for the Crystal
game.objective: Find and return the Crystal of Light to save the kingdom.
game.description: A perilous journey awaits you, King Edmund seeks your aid to defeat Tormak's forces at the dark cave.
game.reward: Success in saving the kingdom and a rare artifact

task.objective: Embark on the journey to the forest.
task.description: Beware of the ogres that guard the path to the cave.

task.objective: Conquer the dark cave and face Tormak's minions.
task.description: Defeat them to reach the heart of the cave.

task.objective: Retrieve the Crystal of Light from Tormak.
task.description: Exchange it for his surrender or defeat him if necessary.

task.objective: Return the crystal to Queen Elara at the castle.
task.description: Restores peace and earns your reward.
